name: pulsar-activity
title: Apache Pulsar Producer Activity
author: TIBCO Software Inc.
description: A Simple activity to produce messages on apache pulsar

display.name: Pulsar Connection
display.description: Connection to an Apache Pulsar broker

display.name: Topic name
display.description: Topic name in the format: topic, tenant/namespace/topic, persistent://topic, persistent://tenant/namespace/topic, non-persistent://tenant/namespace/topic

display.name: Send Timeout
display.description: Set the SendTimeout (in milliseconds) to specify how long to wait for the server to acknowledge the message. If the server doesn't respond within this time, the operation will fail with a SendTimeout error.

display.name: Send Mode
display.description: Select the mode to send message from producer

display.name: Compression Type
display.description: Select the type of compression to be used

display.name: Batching
display.description: Enables batching, allowing the producer to accumulate and send a batch of messages in a single request.

display.name: Batching Max Messages
display.description: Specify the maximum number of messages permitted in a batch.

display.name: Batching Max Size
display.description: Specify the maximum number of bytes permitted in a batch.

display.name: Batching Max Publish Delay
display.description: Specify the time period within which the messages sent will be batched in Millisecond.

display.name: Chunking
display.description: Enables Pulsar to process large payload messages by splitting the message into chunks

display.name: ChunkMaxMessageSize
display.description: Select the maximum size of single chunk payload in bytes

display.name: Enable Replication
display.description: Enables the replication for this message

display.name: Replication Clusters
display.description: Provide the comma separated list of cluster names. Replication Clusters override the replication clusters for this message.

display.name: Message Format
display.description: Select the format for the message body

display.name: Schema for JSON value
display.description: The JSON schema for the topic payload
